Webhooks

Receive real-time notifications when events occur in your ledger.

Available Events

EventDescription
transaction.createdNew transaction recorded
transaction.reversedTransaction was reversed
payout.processedPayout sent to creator
creator.threshold_reachedCreator hit $600 1099 threshold
period.closedAccounting period was closed
reconciliation.completedBank reconciliation finished

Register Webhook

curl -X POST https://api.soledgic.com/v1/webhooks \
  -H "x-api-key: sk_live_your_key" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "url": "https://yourapp.com/webhooks/soledgic",
    "events": ["transaction.created", "payout.processed"],
    "secret": "whsec_your_webhook_secret"
  }'

Webhook Payload

{
  "id": "evt_abc123",
  "type": "transaction.created",
  "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00Z",
  "data": {
    "transaction_id": "txn_xyz789",
    "type": "sale",
    "amount": 9900,
    "reference_id": "order_12345"
  }
}

Verify Signatures

Always verify webhook signatures to ensure requests are from Soledgic:

X-Soledgic-Signature: sha256=...

Verify Signature (Node.js)

const crypto = require('crypto');

function verifyWebhook(payload, signature, secret) {
  const expected = crypto
    .createHmac('sha256', secret)
    .update(payload)
    .digest('hex');
  return crypto.timingSafeEqual(
    Buffer.from(signature),
    Buffer.from('sha256=' + expected)
  );
}
